member this.IsMultiLineModeEnabled : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Toggles multi-line mode. When true, multiple lines can be drawn on the while the tap/click is released in-between lines. Note: when is also enabled, the lines are cleared after the tap/click is released. Additionally, will be fired after each line that is drawn. This is a bindable property.
